info.description: REST API for managing football teams, players, match schedules, results, and reports for Perusahaan XYZ.
info.title: XYZ Football API

post.description: Authenticate with username and password to receive access and refresh tokens
Invalidate a refresh token by removing it from the database
Exchange a valid refresh token for a new access + refresh token pair (token rotation)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all matches with home/away team details

post.description: Creates a new match schedule between two different teams

get.description: Returns details of a single match including goals, home team, and away team

put.description: Updates an existing match schedule. Cannot update a completed match.

delete.description: Soft-deletes a match by its UUID

put.description: Replaces existing goals for a completed match with new result data and recomputes scores

post.description: Submits goals for a scheduled match, auto-computes scores, and marks the match as completed

get.description: Returns details of a single player by its UUID

put.description: Updates an existing player by its UUID. Jersey number must remain unique within the team.

delete.description: Soft-deletes a player by its UUID

get.description: Returns a paginated list of completed match reports with results summary
Returns a detailed report for a completed match including goals, top scorer, match result, and accumulated total wins
Returns a paginated list of all teams with sorting support
Returns details of a single team by its UUID

put.description: Updates an existing team by its UUID

delete.description: Soft-deletes a team by its UUID

get.description: Returns a paginated list of players belonging to the specified team

post.description: Creates a new player under the specified team. Jersey number must be unique within the team.

BearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
